alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 9:07PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Musselshell, central Yellowstone, northern Rosebud and northwestern Treasure Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 904 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles east of Melstone to Worden. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail, along with very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Localized low land or street flooding is possible due to the heavy rain. Locations impacted include... Melstone, Shepherd, Huntley, Worden, Ballantine, Musselshell and Acton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure
